quiz.question: What is the main function of a computer mouse?
options: To move the pointer on the screen
quiz.answer: To move the pointer on the screen

quiz.question: Which part of the mouse do you move on the table to control the pointer?
quiz.answer: The body of the mouse

quiz.question: What is the arrow on the screen that moves when you move the mouse called?
quiz.answer: Cursor

quiz.question: What happens when you double-click an icon on the desktop?
options: It opens the program or file
quiz.answer: It opens the program or file

quiz.question: What is the right mouse button usually used for?
options: Opening a context menu with extra options
quiz.answer: Opening a context menu with extra options

quiz.question: Which finger is commonly used to click the left button of the mouse?
quiz.answer: Index (pointer) finger

quiz.question: What action is used to move an item from one place to another using the mouse?
quiz.answer: Click-and-hold then drag and drop

quiz.question: What is the scroll wheel on the mouse used for?
options: Scrolling up and down through pages
quiz.answer: Scrolling up and down through pages

quiz.question: What is it called when you quickly press the mouse button twice?
quiz.answer: Double-click

quiz.question: How do you open a program using the mouse?
options: Hold the icon and press a key
quiz.answer: Double-click the program icon

quiz.question: What type of mouse uses light (an optical sensor) instead of a ball to detect movement?
quiz.answer: Optical mouse

quiz.question: Which mouse action allows you to view more options for a file or an object?
quiz.answer: Right-click (context menu)

quiz.question: What does the pointer often change into when placed over a link in a browser?
quiz.answer: Hand icon

quiz.question: What happens when you drag and drop a file onto another folder?
options: The file is copied or moved into the folder
quiz.answer: The file is copied or moved into the folder

quiz.question: What do we call moving the mouse pointer over an item without clicking?
quiz.answer: Hovering

quiz.question: Why is it helpful to use a mouse pad?
options: It improves mouse tracking and protects the surface
quiz.answer: It improves mouse tracking and protects the surface

quiz.question: Which device on a laptop performs a similar function to a mouse?
quiz.answer: Touchpad (trackpad)

quiz.question: If the mouse pointer stops moving, what is a good first step to fix it?
options: Check the connection or batteries and clean the sensor
quiz.answer: Check the connection or batteries and clean the sensor

quiz.question: How does a wireless mouse usually connect to a computer?
options: Using Bluetooth or a small USB receiver
By placing it on the keyboard
quiz.answer: Using Bluetooth or a small USB receiver

quiz.question: What is the main difference between an optical mouse and an older mechanical (ball) mouse?
options: Optical mice use light sensors; mechanical mice use a rolling ball
Mechanical mice use batteries; optical mice do not
quiz.answer: Optical mice use light sensors; mechanical mice use a rolling ball

quiz.question: Which common task is drag-and-drop most useful for?
options: Moving files and rearranging items on the screen
quiz.answer: Moving files and rearranging items on the screen

quiz.question: How can you select more than one file in a list using the mouse and keyboard?
options: Click each file and press Save
Click the first file, hold Shift, then click the last file to select a range
quiz.answer: Click the first file, hold Shift, then click the last file to select a range

quiz.question: What does it mean to 'right-click and choose Save as'?
options: You are changing the file color
You open a menu to save a copy of the file with a new name
You close the file without saving
quiz.answer: You open a menu to save a copy of the file with a new name

quiz.question: What is a common pointer shape when you are typing in a document (not pointing at objects)?
quiz.answer: I-beam or text cursor

quiz.question: Which simple care step helps keep your mouse working smoothly?
options: Keep it clean and replace batteries when low
quiz.answer: Keep it clean and replace batteries when low

quiz.question: What happens when you scroll the wheel down on a webpage?
options: The page moves down to show content further down
quiz.answer: The page moves down to show content further down

quiz.question: Which action is best when you want to highlight a single word quickly?
options: Click and drag over the entire paragraph
quiz.answer: Double-click the word

quiz.question: Why is good hand placement important when using a mouse?
options: It keeps your hands comfortable and helps control the pointer accurately
It prevents the screen from moving
quiz.answer: It keeps your hands comfortable and helps control the pointer accurately

quiz.question: How can you change the speed of the mouse pointer in most computers?
options: Through the mouse or pointer settings in the operating system
By moving the mouse faster physically
quiz.answer: Through the mouse or pointer settings in the operating system

quiz.question: What is one advantage of a wireless mouse over a wired one?
options: It offers more freedom of movement without a cable
quiz.answer: It offers more freedom of movement without a cable
